info.title: Digital Bank Experience Services
info.description: Digital Bank Experience API that orchestrates the middleware and home banking APIs

get.description: Get a signature policy by id

parameters.name: _limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of rows to be included on each page in the response.  Fewer rows can be returned, if the query does not yield that many.

parameters.name: from_request_execution_date
parameters.description: Start date for the time period from which payments are to be retrieved, based on the date when the payment was requested.  The date format is 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ', where fff are milliseconds.  If no values are defined for this parameter and the 'to_request_execution_date' parameter, the response includes 50 payments.

parameters.name: to_request_execution_date
parameters.description: End date for the time period from which payments are to be retrieved, based on the date when the payment was requested.  The date format is 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ', where fff are milliseconds.  If no values are defined for this parameter and the 'from_request_execution_date' parameter, the response includes 50 payments.
